import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { BsX } from "react-icons/bs"; const AddModal = (props) => { const [songName, setSongName] = useState(""); const [artist, setArtist] = useState(""); const [chords, setChords] = useState(""); const [youtube, setYoutube] = useState(""); const [status, setStatus] = useState(""); const [notes, setNotes] = useState(""); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const song = { id: Math.random() * 10 + 1, name: songName, artist: artist, chords: chords, youtube: youtube, status: status, notes: notes, lyrics: "", }; props.onAddSong(song); }; return ( <>

setSongName(e.target.value)} />
setArtist(e.target.value)} />
setChords(e.target.value)} />


); }; export default AddModal;
